stanzas: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, like a medicine is a merry heart.
But a broken spirit dryeth the bones, a merry heart doeth good, doeth good like a medicine.
A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, like a medicine is a merry heart.
But a broken spirit dryeth the bones, a merry heart doeth good, doeth good like a medicine.
A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, like a medicine is a merry heart.
But a broken spirit dryeth the bones, a merry heart doeth good, doeth good like a medicine.
A merry heart doeth good, doeth good like a medicine.
